articles.title: Manchester United midfielder Fred suffers Copa America disappointment - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Brazil were beaten by Argentina in the Copa America final and it was a frustrating night for Man Utd midfielder Fred.
articles.content:
Fred suffered a night to forget as Brazil were beaten by arch-rivals Argentina in the Copa America final.
Brazil were favourites to win the trophy on home soil but instead, Lionel Messi won his firs… [+1284 chars]

articles.title: Messi's Argentina beat Neymar's Brazil to win Copa America - New Straits Times
